title: AI Appointment Follow-Up System
summary: Built an AI-driven outbound calling system that automates patient appointment confirmations and rescheduling for nurses, reducing manual follow-up workload and improving scheduling efficiency.

metrics.scalability: Designed to support concurrent outbound calls

bullet_points.text: Designed and built an AI-powered outbound calling system that automates nurse-led appointment confirmations and rescheduling using natural voice interactions.
Implemented real-time speech processing and WebSocket-based communication to extract structured scheduling data from live patient conversations.
Developed a full-stack interface using React and Supabase backed by SQL to manage patients, appointments, and call outcomes for nurse review.
